I live in a studio apartment.
My favorite band is the beatles.
I am studying to become a nurse.
I have three sisters.

participant_2.background:
Dancing is my passion.
I drive a silver lexus.
I m a college student.
I have a dog named socks.
I m terrible at math.

content.text: I like dancing too! Do you have a favorite dance style?
I love salsa dancing! It's so fun and upbeat.
I've always wanted to learn salsa dancing. Do you know of any good places to take lessons?
There are a few studios around town that offer salsa dancing lessons. I took lessons at The Salsa Room, and I really enjoyed it.
I'll have to check that out. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What's your favorite Beatles song?
It's hard to choose, but I think I'd have to say "Yesterday." It's such a beautiful and timeless song.
I love that song too! It's so sad and beautiful at the same time.
Yeah, it is. It's one of those songs that always makes me feel something.
Me too. What are you studying to be a nurse?
I'm going to school to be a pediatric nurse. I've always loved working with kids, and I think it would be a great career.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great nurse.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks, and watch movies.
Me too! I love reading and going for walks. I don't watch a lot of movies, though.
That's okay. I'm sure we can find something to do together.
